setDetails.managerDescription: Revenant Capital is a quantitative asset manager deploying momentum based trading strategies with an emphasis on machine learning
setDetails.setDescription:
The Defi Momentum Index is an algorithmically rebalanced token set with an emphasis on short-to-medium term price action

Objective
The set aims to provide users with exposure to eth/usd (weth/usdc) while systematically hedging against downside risk. The set will initialize as 100% usd and will be dollar-cost-averaged into its target rebalance ratio.

Set Parameters:
  - Underlying Asset: ETH
  - Rebalance Ratio (Start): 0:100
  - Rebalance Ratio (Target): 80:20
  - Rebalance Ratio (Max): 100:0
  - Rebalance Ratio (Min): 60:40

Strategy
The set runs an aggressive momentum based 1x leveraged spot rebalancing strategy. The rebalancing strategy is powered by the DeepRSI trading engine with token rebalances occurring daily. Returns from the rebalancing strategy are rolled back into ETH so as to maintain set equilibrium. Read more on DeepRSI: https://twitter.com/thenatlog/status/1417233961030324234

Fee Structure
The Defi Momentum Index will have a streaming fee of 3% (300 basis points). The streaming fee scales linearly up from 0 over the duration of 1 year (365 days)
